p: In Uganda, the NSP (2015/16–2019/20) and PEPFAR Country Operational Plan state target ART coverage levels of 80% of PLHIV rather than then 81% that is cited in the UNAIDS 90–90–90 targets. Uganda’s marginally lower target of may be described as a ‘combined response’, which pertains to a mixture of different policies relevant to the target as the 80% may instead reflect the adoption of ‘universal access’ targets ( World Health Organization 2013).
